Achievements.Name: Can Do!
Achievements.Description: Complete all co-op Overwatch Missions

Achievements.Name: Detonator
Achievements.Description: Career total of 50 shots on explosives

Achievements.Name: Bomb Happy
Achievements.Description: Survive 10 Games of bombing run

Achievements.Name: Bedpan Commando
Achievements.Description: Resuscitate your partner in coop 10 times

Achievements.Name: Target Eliminated!
Achievements.Description: As a sniper in Overwatch, snipe 50 enemies tagged by your partner

Achievements.Name: Target Spotted!
Achievements.Description: As a spotter in Overwatch, tag 50 enemies

Achievements.Name: Kilroy was Here
Achievements.Description: Make it through the tower to the winch room without being spotted

Achievements.Name: Fish Tank
Achievements.Description: Send the tank into the river by blowing up the bridge

Achievements.Name: High and Mighty
Achievements.Description: Wipe out the Elite Russian Sniper Team from the rooftops

Achievements.Name: Get Off the ground
Achievements.Description: Kill everyone in the convoy from ground level, except for Kreidl

Achievements.Name: Sniper Elite
Achievements.Description: Complete all missions on highest difficulty

Achievements.Name: Legendary Sniper
Achievements.Description: Prevent Wolff from escaping

Achievements.Name: Feared Sniper
Achievements.Description: Destroy the V2 rocket

Achievements.Name: Veteran Sniper
Achievements.Description: Discover the location of the V2 launch site

Achievements.Name: Master Sniper
Achievements.Description: Uncover Wolff's plan

Achievements.Name: Expert Sniper
Achievements.Description: Eliminate Mller

Achievements.Name: Pro Sniper
Achievements.Description: Collect intel from the church and make it out alive

Achievements.Name: Skilled Sniper
Achievements.Description: Stop the execution

Achievements.Name: Journeyman Sniper
Achievements.Description: Hold off the Russian advance

Achievements.Name: Apprentice Sniper
Achievements.Description: Destroy the V2 Facility and escape to safety

Achievements.Name: Novice Sniper
Achievements.Description: Stop the convoy

Achievements.Name: Trainee Sniper
Achievements.Description: Escape the German assault

Achievements.Name: Hide and Hope
Achievements.Description: Complete a level without being shot a single time

Achievements.Name: Make Every Bullet Count
Achievements.Description: Complete a level with 100% accuracy, using only rifles

Achievements.Name: Cooking Off
Achievements.Description: Snipe a grenade on an enemy's webbing from 100m

Achievements.Name: Double Dose
Achievements.Description: Snipe 2 people with one shot

Achievements.Name: Pass the Buck
Achievements.Description: Get a sniped ricochet headshot

Achievements.Name: Gold Rush
Achievements.Description: Find and retrieve all the stolen gold bars

Achievements.Name: Jungle Juice
Achievements.Description: Find and snipe all the hidden bottles throughout the game

Achievements.Name: Head Honcho
Achievements.Description: Get 100 sniped headshots

Achievements.Name: Gung Ho
Achievements.Description: Snipe 100 moving targets

Achievements.Name: World Record
Achievements.Description: Get 506 cumulative sniper kills

Achievements.Name: Potato Masher
Achievements.Description: Kill 100 enemies with explosives

Achievements.Name: Iron Lung
Achievements.Description: Hold your breath for a cumulative time of half an hour

Achievements.Name: Go the Distance
Achievements.Description: Get a cumulative sniped kill distance of a marathon

Achievements.Name: Deadeye
Achievements.Description: Snipe an enemy through his eye

Achievements.Name: Silent but deadly
Achievements.Description: Covertly kill 25 unaware enemies

Achievements.Name: Fuel Tank
Achievements.Description: Destroy a tank by sniping the fuel supply

Achievements.Name: Ear Plugs
Achievements.Description: Snipe an enemy while your rifle fire is masked by a loud sound

Achievements.Name: Mousetrap Fuse
Achievements.Description: Use a trip mine to kill an enemy who is trying to assault your position

Achievements.Name: Front and Center
Achievements.Description: Get a scoped headshot over 150m
